description.en: Brochure made for a steel structure company
Pictures taken of 'Chamán', an 'emoliente' maker that works on the streets of Surco, Lima. He is specialized on medical 'emoliente' (a variant from a traditional peruvian beverage).

Illustration of Wario and Waluigi (from the Mario-Nintendo franchise) in an Orion bus, a well-known transport company in Peru for having really bad service, driving recklessly and not respecting the transit laws.
Logo made for our own marketing agency in Perú.
